使用远程API获取表格数据，并进行后台分页: Use remote API to get table data and perform background paging
当前用户在固定的用户列表内就正常访问，没在的话跳转到无权限页面。可在页面生命周期:
The current user can access normally in the fixed user list. If not, it will jump to the page without permission. 
This function can be configured in the page life cycle function for permission control.
想更灵活使用后台转发接口的能力，可以使用本函数。调用转发函数的参数如函数内容所示:
If you want to use the ability of the background forwarding interface more flexibly, you can use this function. 
The parameters of calling the forwarding function are as shown in the function content, and the parameters can be dynamically changed by combining variables. 
Business logic is handled in the then callback.
用于清空表单容器组件中每一个输入组件的值: Used to clear the value of each input component in the form container component.
由于部分接口限制（比如跨域），纯前端无法调用该接口。需要通过后端转发接口来获取数:
Due to some interface restrictions (such as Cross-Domain), the pure front-end cannot call this interface. 
You can use this method if you need to obtain data through the backend forwarding interface. 
Configuration method: configure the interface address on the Api Url, write business processing in the function slot, and write business processing callback parameters in the remote parameter configuration.
获取当前登录的用户名: Get the currently logged in username
表单容器组件的表单生成器: Form builder for the form container component
表单校验及提交数据至远程API: Form validation and submit data to remote API
退出登录，并跳转到登录页面: Log out and jump to the login page
通过前端获取远程接口数据示例。可以替换代码中的接口地址来调用其它接口，在回调中进:
Fetch remote interface data example via frontend. 
You can replace the interface address in the code to call other interfaces, and perform business processing in the callback.
通过远程函数动态设置表格的表头内容: Dynamically set the header content of the table through a remote function
如果需要对页面中的表单容器进行校验，可以使用本函数。注意：函数中的 dynami:
If you need to validate the form container in the page, you can use this function. 
Note: dynamicForm in the function needs to be replaced with the value of the ref attribute of the form container component, and the ref value of each form in the page needs to be unique.
